!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Challenger* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Challenger. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. And to take the Trial of the Challenger, visit *Kash of Dion Castle Town*. The *Mark of Glory* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Glory. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Glory, visit *Prefect Vokian of Giran Castle Town*. And finally, the *Mark of the Champion* is only given to those who pass the Test of the Champion. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of the Champion, visit *Veteran Ascalon of Giran Castle Town*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30513/07.htm|Return]Â
